strings.Value: "Somehow this gloomy place reminds me of the nights I spent in the fields of Galt as a back-country girl. The babbling brooks, grass caressing your face, and the stars smiling down upon you..."
"When I'm afraid to fall asleep, I like pretending that I'm high in the mountains. The proud, snow-covered peaks, lofty pines — and not a soul in sight..."
"Sounds magical! I'd love to visit such a place someday..."

"You should go to my homeland. No place in the world are there stars and mountains like those... Although the people, like my family — there's no place in the world that has them either. I'm glad about that!"
[Listens with his eyes closed, with a smile on his face]
"Yeah. Ha, ha, ha, hmm... You've got some imagination."
